name: WebSoup
overview: WebSoup is a SEO Agency and Software House created in Lucca, Italy, by a group of young professionals. With many years of experience of its founders in the field of communication and computing, WebSoup offers web marketing services and digital communication strategies tailored to the particular needs of public and private organizations working in cultural heritage, shows and events. WebSoup develops high-tech solutions in collaboration with other young Ialian start-up, in the field of Cloud Computing and Web Marketing Strategies. WebSoup deals with optimization of web sites according to the strategies of search engine marketing to increase visibility on the Internet, provides analysis of the performance of these operations, organizes pay per click campaigns, web and social campaings. WebSoup create websites, organizing promotional events and carries forward the development of the innovative tool Souppy: an aggregator of social networks that facilitate the management of Social Media Marketing Campaigns. The agency is also responsible for the development and marketing of a software management in Cloud called WebSoup Management System.

offices.address1: Via della Chiesa XXXII, n.231 Trav I
